title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Derelict Sites Act 1990 

(Urban Areas) Regulations 2022. 

(2) These Regulations and the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 

2018 may be cited together as the Derelict Sites Regulations, 1990 to 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited derelict site act 1990 (urban areas) regulation 2022 (2) regulation derelict site regulation 1990 2018 may cited together derelict site regulation 1990 2022

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Act of 1990” means the Derelict Sites Act 1990 

(No. 14 of 1990).
text_norm: 2 regulation act 1990 mean derelict site act 1990 (no 14 1990)

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: 3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Cavan
text_raw:
3. (1) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Cavan 
specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(2) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Clare 
specified in Part 2 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(3) Each of the areas situated in the administrative city of Cork specified in 
Part 3 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the purposes of the 
Act of 1990. 

(4) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Galway 
specified in Part 4 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(5) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Meath 
specified in Part 5 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(6) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Offaly 
specified in Part 6 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

(7) Each of the areas situated in the administrative county of Westmeath 
specified in Part 7 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the 
purposes of the Act of 1990. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th June, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [289] 3
text_norm: 3 (1) area situated administrative county cavan specified part 1 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (2) area situated administrative county clare specified part 2 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (3) area situated administrative city cork specified part 3 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (4) area situated administrative county galway specified part 4 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (5) area situated administrative county meath specified part 5 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (6) area situated administrative county offaly specified part 6 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 (7) area situated administrative county westmeath specified part 7 schedule prescribed urban area purpose act 1990 notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 17th june 2022 289 3

title: specified in Part 1 of the Schedule is prescribed to be an urban area for the
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

These Regulations prescribe areas in the cities/counties of Cork City, County 
Galway, County Offaly, County Clare, County Meath, County Cavan and 
County Westmeath indicated to be urban areas for the purposes of the Derelict 
Sites Act, 1990. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 16 [289] 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS, 
BÓTHAR BHAILE UÍ BHEOLÁIN, 
CILL MHAIGHNEANN, 
BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Teil: 046 942 3100 
r-phost: publications@opw.ie 
—————— 

DUBLIN 
PUBLISHED BY THE STATIONERY OFFICE 
To be purchased from 
GOVERNMENT PUBLICATIONS, 
MOUNTSHANNON ROAD, 
KILMAINHAM, DUBLIN 8, 
D08 XAO6 

Tel: 046 942 3100 
E-mail: publications@opw.ie 
—————— 

€3.50 

(PPS-26) 75. 6/22. Propylon.
